org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache

Class CacheGroupMetricsMXBeanImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.CacheGroupMetricsMXBeanImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheGroupMetricsMXBean

    public class CacheGroupMetricsMXBeanImpl
extends Object
implements CacheGroupMetricsMXBean
    Management bean that provides access to CacheGroupContext.

      • getAffinityPartitionsAssignmentMap

        public Map<Integer,List<String>> getAffinityPartitionsAssignmentMap()
        Gets affinity partitions assignment map.
        Specified by:
        getAffinityPartitionsAssignmentMap in interface CacheGroupMetricsMXBean
        Returns:
        Map from partition number to list of nodes. The first node in this list is where the PRIMARY partition is assigned, other nodes in the list is where the BACKUP partitions is assigned.
